name: North Indian
description: North Indian refers to the indigenous varieties of cannabis (or landraces) that grow natively in this region of the world. Because of this region's latitude and climate, these native landrace strains tend to be indica in structure and effect.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Happy, Hungry, Aroused, Sleepy, Eye Pressure, Muscle Spasms, Nausea, Stress, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy
